biotools.summary:
An improved web predictor for identifying the types of ion channel-targeted conotoxins by using reduced amino acid cluster descriptors.

Identifying the ion channel-targeted conotoxins using reduced amino acid alphabet composition.

Conotoxins are small peptide toxins which are rich in disulfide and have the unique diversity of sequences.
